CROW.name: CROW

attack.description: Throw a feather

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Deals anti-heal for 4 sec every 3 attacks
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Drains 3 Energy every 3 attacks
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Deals 2x damage to injured enemies

SCARECROW.name: SCARECROW
SCARECROW.description: A character that serves as a scarecrow

attack.description: He turns around on himself

ultimate.description: Deals a backwards dash, spawning a 15 HP scarecrow

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Gain 1 max HP every 6 hits (max 30HP)
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Spawned scarecrow has 30HP
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Spawned Scarecrow gains Taunted

HERO PUPIL.name: HERO PUPIL
HERO PUPIL.description: A lovable character who improves through his team.

attack.description: With his ponytail

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> +5% of attack speed for each upgrade on the team
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> +1 HP for all characters for each upgrade on the team
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> +4 HP for each upgrade on the team

SPORE HUNTER.name: SPORE HUNTER
SPORE HUNTER.description: A powerful character that affects all characters.

attack.description: Throws spores that spread across the map in 20 sec

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> +4HP per sec to allies
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> 3 DMG per sec
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Spores spread across the map in 10 sec

SPECTRUM.name: SPECTRUM
SPECTRUM.description: A character that bounce attack and grant invisibility

attack.description: Throws his spectre spear through an opponent

ultimate.description: Makes all allies invisible for 2 sec and gains 2x DMG

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Spear bounce to another character
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Bounce 3 times (+1 bounce)
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Makes all allies invisible for 4 sec

STAR CALLER.name: STAR CALLER
STAR CALLER.description: A Stelar Mini that improves with every attack

attack.description: Shoots a stelar light with her stelar cannon

ultimate.description: Trows a star at the farthest ally, healing 33% HP

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> +1 DMG per 5 attacks
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> +0.05 ATK speed per attack
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Heal 66% HP

NIGHTMARE.name: NIGHTMARE
NIGHTMARE.description: A terrifying Mini that can remove upgrades.
NIGHTMARE.clash: Remove all upgrades from the Mini in front of him.
upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> <txt class='damageUpgrade'>3x damage</txt> to injured Minis.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Boast:</txt> <txt class='damageUpgrade'>+1 DMG</txt> permanent.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Clash:</txt> <txt class='healthUpgrade'>+15 HP,</txt> <txt class='damageUpgrade'>+1 DMG,</txt> <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>+0.1 ATK speed</txt> per upgrade removed.

SUNKEN.name: SUNKEN
SUNKEN.description: The perfect Mini to slow all opponent Minis.

ultimate.description: Create a Tsunami dealing 8 DMG and -66% Slow for 6 sec.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Deals 16 DMG.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Rest 2 sec to surf another wave.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Also Slow -33%.

GENIE.name: GENIE
GENIE.description: The perfect Mini against tank Minis.
upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Deals <txt class='damageUpgrade'>15% of the opponent Mini's max HP</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>KOed:</txt> Burns all opponents dealing 2 DMG/sec for 5 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack Speed:</txt> <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>+1% ATK speed</txt> per 4 HP of opponents Minis.

GRIFFIN.name: GRIFFIN
GRIFFIN.description: A crazy Mini that is just crazy.
GRIFFIN.clash: Dashes to the nearest enemy and returns, dealing 3 DMG and stunning for 0.5 sec.
upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Clash:</txt> Deals <txt class='damageUpgrade'>6 DMG</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Clash:</txt> <txt class='stunUpgrade'>Stuns</txt> for 1 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Clash:</txt> Clash becomes Ulti with an Energy cost of 4.

KRAKEN.name: KRAKEN

ultimate.description: Throws ink that disarms the enemy for 0.5 sec.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Boast:</txt> <txt class='healthUpgrade'>Full HP</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> <txt class='unespeciedUpgrade'>Disarms</txt> for 1 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Deals <txt class='damageUpgrade'>+1 DMG</txt> to injured enemies.

ELIXIR PEDDLER.name: ELIXIR PEDDLER
ELIXIR PEDDLER.description: A complicated Mini that can change matches.

attack.description: Throws his elixir bowl, dealing damage in a 3x3 area.

ELIXIR PEDDLER.passive: Can move him once time per match replacing another Mini giving you the Elixir you spent.
upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Gain <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>2% attack speed</txt> per stored elixir.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> Gain <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>8% attack speed</txt> per elixir returned.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>KO:</txt> Leaves a 3x3 permanent elixir puddle dealing 4 DMG every 2 sec.

BARD.name: BARD
BARD.description: A powerful Mini if you know how to positionate him.

attack.description: Create a 3x3 wave of musical notes.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> <txt class='healthUpgrade'>Heals 10 HP</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> <txt class='stunUpgrade'>Stun</txt> 0.5 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Boast:</txt> <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>100% attack speed</txt> for 6 sec.

CYCLOPS.name: CYCLOPS
CYCLOPS.description: A Mini that calls others identical Mini.

attack.description: Slap the enemy.

ultimate.description: Use horn to call other cyclops with the same abilities and upgrades.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>+25% attack speed</txt> around him for 6 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Call 2 cyclopes.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> <txt class='damageUpgrade'>2X DMG</txt> around him for 6 sec.

SAMURAI.name: SAMURAI

ultimate.description: Dash through enemies to the farthest one dealing 4 DMG.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>+5% attack speed</txt> for each enemy hit.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Boast:</txt> <txt class='healthUpgrade'>Heal 30% HP</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Deals <txt class='damageUpgrade'>2x damage</txt> when isolated.

TIME TRAVELER.name: TIME TRAVELER
TIME TRAVELER.description: A unique Mini that can teleport enemies and heal itself.

attack.description: Throw a Temporal Disk.

TIME TRAVELER.passive: For every 6 hits teleport the enemy to the farthest square and heal itself 10% of HP.
upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack Speed:</txt> <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>+50% attack speed</txt> while in Super.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> Passive cast every 4 hits.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> When overhealth gains <txt class='damageUpgrade'>2X Damage</txt>.

BUTCHER.name: BUTCHER
BUTCHER.description: A crazy Mini very powerful that can turn against you.

attack.description: Hits with his kitchen knife.

BUTCHER.passive: If recibe +15 DMG in 3 sec goes crazy gaining 50% hit speed and 2x DMG, attacking allies and enemies for 4 sec.
upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> Can receive 25 DMG.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> Allies do not receive <txt class='damageUpgrade'>2x damage</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Boast:</txt> <txt class='healthUpgrade'>Heals 30% HP</txt>.

DREAM WEAVER.name: DREAM WEAVER
DREAM WEAVER.description: A mage Mini that confuses enemies using the power of dreams.

attack.description: Throw a dream wave with his staff.

DREAM WEAVER.passive: When KOed, team heals 2% every 2 sec.

ultimate.description: Throw an illusionary wave hitting the nearest enemy and confusing them to attack their allies for 4 sec.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Confused Mini deals <txt class='damageUpgrade'>2x damage</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Super duration takes 7 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> When KOed, team <txt class='healthUpgrade'>heals 4%</txt> every 2 sec.

ROCKET MACHINE.name: ROCKET MACHINE
ROCKET MACHINE.description: A mechanical Mini that can deploy a shield to protect allies. Specialises in protection and high damage.

attack.description: Launch a rocket.

ultimate.description: Deploy a shield to the nearest ally.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Deals 2 damage around the attack.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Grant <txt class='damageUpgrade'>x2 Damage</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Reduces reload speed by 0.5 sec per shield granted.

SAINT GOBLIN.name: SAINT GOBLIN
SAINT GOBLIN.description: A melee tank Mini that avoid and reflects damage.
upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Damage Reduction:</txt> Takes <txt class='unespeciedUpgrade'>50% less damage</txt> when Injured.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Reflects <txt class='unespeciedUpgrade'>50% of damage</txt> taken.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Super also <txt class='healthUpgrade'>heals</txt>.

FOREST GUARDIAN.name: FOREST GUARDIAN
FOREST GUARDIAN.description: A ranged Mini that can grow vines to attack and support.

attack.description: Grow vines - Attacks the farthest enemy and deals damage to nearby squares.

ultimate.description: Grow vines up to the farthest ally.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> <txt class='stunUpgrade'>Stuns enemies</txt> for 3 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Grants <txt class='unespeciedUpgrade'>1 Energy</txt> to allies.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> Grants allies <txt class='unespeciedUpgrade'>Unstoppable</txt> for 4 sec.

BUFFOON.name: BUFFOON
BUFFOON.description: A Mini that heals with every attack.

attack.description: Hits with an energy orb - Heals all allies with 100% of the HP she deals with each attack.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Deals <txt class='damageUpgrade'>3 DMG</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Health:</txt> <txt class='healthUpgrade'>200% HP</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Heal:</txt> Can heal itself.

UNDERTAKER.name: UNDERTAKER
UNDERTAKER.description: A legendary Mini who can revive allies.

ultimate.description: Revive the longest dead ally with <txt class='healthUpgrade'>50% HP</txt>.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Ultimate:</txt> Ally revives to <txt class='healthUpgrade'>100% HP</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Ultimate:</txt> When revive an ally both gains <txt class='damageUpgrade'>+1 DMG</txt> (stacks).
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Gains <txt class='unespeciedUpgrade'>100% HP steal</txt>.

MOA.name: MOA
MOA.description: A tank Mini that attack final squares and make time

attack.description: Hitting the ground in a <txt class='damageUpgrade'>3x4 area</txt>.

ultimate.description: Disarm the nearest enemy for <txt class='stunUpgrade'>3</txt> sec.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> <txt class='damageUpgrade'>+3</txt> attack damage.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> <txt class='damageUpgrade'>+1 target (the farthest)</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Super:</txt> <txt class='stunUpgrade'>+3 sec</txt> of disarm.

VIPER DAGGER.name: VIPER DAGGER
VIPER DAGGER.description: A deadly Mini who poison enemies accumulating a lot of damage.

attack.description: Throwing his dagger - Deals 2 damage and applies a poison effect that deals 1 damage every 3 seconds (stacks 6 times).

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Poison:</txt> Poison deals damage every 2 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Boast:</txt> <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>+100% attack speed</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Poison:</txt> Poison can stack infinitely.

RUBY.name: RUBY
RUBY.description: A dangerous Mini that can attack and stun quickly

attack.description: Ruby attacks with her sword.

ultimate.description: Turns her weapon around and fires a stun musket shot.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Ultimate:</txt> Deals <txt class='damageUpgrade'>+8 DMG</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Deals <txt class='slowUpgrade'>-40% slow</txt> for 1 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Ultimate:</txt> Each ulti cast decreases the energy cost by 1 (stack per round).

WHISPY.name: WHISPY
WHISPY.description: A friendly Mini that is a great support

attack.description: Whispy hits with his briefcase in a 3x1 area.

WHISPY.passive: When he dies he leaves his briefcase behind him.

briefcase.description: Gives a 30% hit speed boost around him.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> <txt class='shieldUpgrade'>+5 shield</txt> every 5 sec to allies close to the briefcase.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>+ 5% hit speed</txt> per ally near the briefcase.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Whispy also leaves the briefcase at the beginning of the round.

ZANE.name: ZANE
ZANE.description: A skillful Mini that throws earrings, gaining shields for each KO.

attack.description: Zane throws the balls of his earrings hitting 2 enemies.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>KO:</txt> For each ally or enemy KOed, Zane gains <txt class='shieldUpgrade'>15 shield</txt>.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>KO:</txt> For each ally or enemy KOed, Zane gains <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>25% hit speed</txt> (stack per round).
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Round End:</txt> If Zane pass the round, he receives a <txt class='damageUpgrade'>+1 damage</txt>.

NIX.name: NIX
NIX.description: A supportive Mini that boosts allies and generate elixir

attack.description: Nix gives a slap.

NIX.passive: Gives a <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>15% hit speed</txt> boost to the ally on it right and every 15 sec gains 1 elixir (while alive).
upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> +1 of elixir received.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> -5 sec elixir generation (10 sec).
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Passive:</txt> If far from your partner: <txt class='damageUpgrade'>x2 attack</txt>, and if close: <txt class='healthUpgrade'>heal 10% HP</txt> every 5s

BATTY.name: BATTY
BATTY.description: A Mini that bites and stuns enemies with a sonic scream.

attack.description: Batty bites the enemy.

ultimate.description: Launches a sonic scream that stuns and damages enemies in a 3x3 area, and knocks them back one square.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Ultimate:</txt> <txt class='stunUpgrade'>Increases stun duration</txt> by 1.5 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Injured:</txt> When is injured gains fury until he dies or recovers.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> His attack does <txt class='unespeciedUpgrade'>life steal</txt> (66%).

YUKI.name: YUKI
YUKI.description: A frosty Mini that slow enemies

attack.description: Yuki throws a snowball.

ultimate.description: Yuki throws a giant snowball at the farthest enemy applying slow.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>KO:</txt> <txt class='slowUpgrade'>Slow</txt> to nearby enemies 8 sec
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Ultimate:</txt> His ulti <txt class='stunUpgrade'>stuns</txt> for 1 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> Its basic attack also <txt class='slowUpgrade'>slows</txt> the target.

RAYA.name: RAYA
RAYA.description: A Mini that heal and damage with her ultimate

attack.description: Raya hits the ground with her hammer dealing damage in 3x1 area.

ultimate.description: Raya raises her shield healing allies and damaging enemies around her.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Ultimate:</txt> <txt class='shieldUpgrade'>+ 10 shield</txt> in ulti area.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Boast:</txt> <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>2X Hit speed</txt> for 6s.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Attack:</txt> If hits 3 enemies at once does <txt class='damageUpgrade'>2X ATK</txt>.

SPARKY.name: SPARKY
SPARKY.description: A nimble Mini that stun and gain speed when injured.

ultimate.description: Sparky make a big hit with his cane.

upgrades: <txt class='specialUpgrade'>Injured:</txt> When Sparky is Injured, increases his <txt class='attackSpeedUpgrade'>attack speed</txt> by 50%.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Ultimate:</txt> <txt class='stunUpgrade'>Increases stun duration</txt> by 1 sec.
<txt class='specialUpgrade'>Ultimate:</txt> <txt class='unespeciedUpgrade'>Reduces energy cost</txt> by 1.
